name: Yoshgramm-wen Yards
author: Derelict_Surveyor (Forum)/Juliet_Delta_Tango_1-5 (Discord)
description: Distributes ships inspired by the designs seen in the Legend of the Galactic Heroes, Gundam franchise, Space Battleship Yamato 2199, Macross SDFDYRL, Gunbuster, and a handful of others. A work-in-progress ship pack.
